mapper.insert: insert into img (imgtype, file_rt, u_name, o_name, e_name, w_size, h_size, img_full_rt, first_id, last_id) values (#{imgtype}, #{file_rt}, #{u_name}, #{o_name}, #{e_name}, #{w_size}, #{h_size}, #{img_full_rt}, #{first_id}, #{last_id});
INSERT INTO img_group (group_no, img_no, first_id, last_id) values (#{group_no}, #{img_no}, #{userid}, #{userid});
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(group_no), 0) AS max_group_no FROM img_group;
mapper.update: update img set state = #{state} where group_no = #{no};
